isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - Install CAB DOOR LATCH ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: Install CAB DOOR LATCH ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 76 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position inside and outside cab door latch assemblies (Item 2) in place on the side of the cab door. Install four mounting screws (Item 1) and tighten, driver side shown.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 75 for Items in parentheses.

caution.para: To prevent damage to the door while fully open, reinstall the door check strap.

step1.para: Install door key lock control rod (Item 9) onto cab door latch assembly (Item 3). Slide retaining clip (Item 8) onto door key lock control rod to secure it, driver side shown.
Install outer cab door handle control rod (Item 7) onto cab door latch assembly (Item 3). Slide retaining clip (Item 6) onto outer cab door handle control rod to secure it, driver side shown.
Install door lock button control rod (Item 5) onto cab door latch assembly (Item 3). Slide retaining clip (Item 4) onto door lock button control rod to secure it, driver side shown.
Install inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) onto cab door latch assembly (Item 3). Slide retaining clip (Item 1) onto outer cab door handle control rod to secure it, driver side shown.

svcproc.para: If installing DRIVER SIDE CAB DOOR LATCH ASSEMBLY follow Steps 6 and 7 below.

step1.para:
Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

svcproc.para: If installing PASSENGER SIDE CAB DOOR LATCH ASSEMBLY follow Steps 8 and 9 below.

step1.para:
Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.
